Subjects: scripture texts, paraphrases; tales, from Scripture

BLCottNeroAX.First Lines:
Clannesse whoso kyndly cowþe comendeAnd rekken vp alle þe
                    resounz þat ho by riȝt askez…
BLCottNeroAX.Last Lines:
…Þat we gon gay in oure gere þat grace he vus
                    sendeÞat we may serue in his syȝt þer solace neuer
                    blynnez
